nodes.text: Hangra's Meat Shack was a food vendor stall set up on Level 2142 of the city-planet Coruscant. Shortly after the destruction of the planet Alderaan by the Galactic Empire, the stall's grill was operated by an old man who was approached by Anandra Milon, an Alderaanian survivor. Milon asked the man about the "Centax 3 delivery" in attempt to appear lost and confused, and the man eventually gave her a small amount of the food from the stall. The stall had a greasy metal counter.
Hangra's Meat Shack first appeared in One Thousand Levels Down, a short story written by Alexander Freed and published in Star Wars Insider 151 in 2014.
